Developer Terms of Use
des: Get your news updates from WKTV NewsChannel 2 -- the leading provider of local news, weather information, sports, community events and breaking news in the Mohawk Valley and Central New York.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
